body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
When looking at mixed logs it's not always easy to clearly see what lines are from temporal services and what isn't .

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I would like to see a tag, label or other consistent indicator that a log line originated from temporal.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
None

**Additional context**
None

comments.body: Oh - one thing I just realized, this might need to be in sdk-go. We're on the cloud service, so we only consume it via the SDK.

title: Add well known indicator/label/tag to log output for temporal
